text: Venom is a 2018 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name, produced by Columbia Pictures in association with Marvel and Tencent Pictures. Distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing, it is the first movie in Sony's Spider-Man Universe, adjunct to the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Directed by Ruben Fleischer from a screenplay by Scott Rosenberg, Jeff Pinkner, and Kelly Marcel, it stars Tom Hardy as Eddie Brock / Venom, alongside Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed, Scott Haze, and Reid Scott. In Venom, journalist Brock gains superpowers after being bound to an alien symbiote whose species plans to invade Earth. Despite receiving mixed reviews from film critics, the film was positively welcomed from audience and fans alike which praised its story, humor, Eddie Brock and Venom's relationship, characters, soundtrack, special effects, cast performances (especially Hardy's double one), action scenes and the ending. ==Cast== *Tom Hardy as Eddie Brock / Venom *Michelle Williams as Ann Weying *Riz Ahmed as Dr. Carlton Drake / Riot *Jenny Slate as Dr. Dora Skirth *Woody Harrelson as Cletus Kassady (cameo) ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2018 movies Category:American superhero movies Category:English-language movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:American movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Drone movies Category:IMAX movies Category:Movies set in 2018 Category:Sony's Spider-Man Universe movies Category:Movies composed by Ludwig GÃ¶ransson Category:Movies directed by Ruben Fleischer Category:Movies about journalists Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:Movies set in Malaysia Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Venom (movie series)
title: Venom (2018 movie)
